Backgrid.Extension.ColumnManager ColumnManager Class

Defined in: /home/wilbert/github/backgrid-columnmanager/src/Backgrid.ColumnManager.js:14
Module: Backgrid.ColumnManager

Manages visibility of columns.

Constructor

Backgrid.Extension.ColumnManager ColumnManager

(
  • columns
  • [options]
  • [state]
)

Defined in /home/wilbert/github/backgrid-columnmanager/src/Backgrid.ColumnManager.js:14

Parameters:

  • columns Backgrid.Columns
  • [options] Object optional
    • [initialColumnCount] Number optional

      Initial amount of columns to show. Default is null (All visible).

    • [trackSize] Boolean optional
    • [trackOrder] Boolean optional
    • [trackVisibility] Boolean optional
    • [stateChecking] String optional

      can be "strict" or "loose".

    • [saveState] Boolean optional
    • [saveStateKey] String optional

      Storage key. Must be unique for location. Can be left out if this plugin is only used in one place.

    • [saveStateLocation] String optional

      Can be "localStorage" (default) or "sessionStorage" (be aware, session stored values are lost when window is closed)

    • [loadStateOnInit] Boolean optional
  • [state] Array optional
  • Index
  • Methods
